query: River City Gravel Fondo gravel race Campbell River

videos.title: River City Gravel Fondo| BC Gravel Series. Impulso Distance. April 20, 2025.
videos.description: Join me as I participate in the Impulso distance of the first gravel race of the season on Vancouver Island. The race is the River City Gravel Fondo in Campbell River, BC. This is the first race of the BC Gravel Series. #gravelrace #gravelracing #gravelriding #vancouverisland #trekbikes #activeseniors #activewomen #campbellriver

videos.title: River City Gravel Race 2025, Campbell River, BC
videos.description:
Gravel race in Campbell River, BC.  Event organized by Panache Cycling.

Minimal editing and no background track but a good vid to get an idea of the area and race conditions.  A couple of notable points:
11min - my chain came off
21min - got blown past by the elite riders on the long course

videos.title: 2024 River City Gravel Fondo p/b Riverway Dental
videos.description:
The @trekbikes  Gravel Series on Vancouver Island presented by Mosaic Forest Management features 3 exciting and challenging events in Campbell River, Duncan, and Nanaimo.   

April 21 - River City Gravel Fondo p/b Riverway Dental
May 18/19 - Burnt Bridge Classic p/b Liquor Plus
June 16 - Nanaimo Unpaved p/b Liquor Plus

The event is also proudly supported by the  @DestinationCampbellRiver Nanaimo Hospitality Association  @myCVRD   @cowichantourism   @f2cnutrition781

🤔 ABOUT TREK BIKES VICTORIA 😃

Locally owned and operated, the Trek Bike Store in Victoria, BC has been around for more than a decade. Just minutes from downtown you will find the mother ship conveniently next door to Spinnakers brewpub. 

Plenty of parking will allow you to cruise through the memorabilia while enjoying a relaxing coffee. (After covid)

Website ► https://trekbikesvictoria.com
